title: Publish build 64 to Live (frontend-only operational triggers)

requirements.summary: Add a non-functional operational publish marker to trigger deploying build 64 to Live via CI/CD.
acceptanceCriteria: Build version 64 is deployed to Live successfully
The Live URL serves build 64 without deployment errors

file_operations.description: Create an operational publish marker for build 64 (no functional changes) intended to trigger the Live deployment workflow in CI/CD.

requirements.summary: Add a build 64 redeploy trigger file modeled after the existing build 63 trigger file, with no behavior changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new file exists at frontend/redeploy-trigger.build64.txt
The file indicates Build: 64 and states it is an operational redeploy trigger with no functional changes
A new CI/build artifact is produced as a result of the commit containing this file

file_operations.description: Create a redeploy trigger file for Build: 64 modeled after frontend/redeploy-trigger.build63.txt, updating build number and timestamp, and explicitly noting it is an operational redeploy trigger with no functional changes.
